title: Beholder 3
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Not Supported**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: When a high-ranking security officer saves you from prison, you end up a pawn in her schemes. Now you must eliminate anyone standing in the way of her secret plans and try to get your life back while working two jobs. No tenant, employee or superior is safe from your spying.
